alert.note: Alert for Carter (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 5:31PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Carter County through 615 PM MDT... At 531 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Ridgeway, or 28 miles south of Ekalaka, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Carter County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
